title: Bai Wan Tong Ju Ji Hua
overview: Ng Chiu Ming is a carefree and unambitious guy who loves money but doesn't have goals or a direction in life. One day, a famous businesswoman, Ms. Fok, invites him to move into her luxurious house with a few other contestants. Those that survive the six-month period will each receive one million dollars. However, more and more problems surface as time goes by.
